response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your needs and goals. Considering its value and the benefits it provides, I propose a price of $10,000 for this exceptional item. This offer aims to provide you with a competitive advantage while ensuring a fair return on my investment.
